text: Spies Like Us is a 1985 American British adventure comedy movie directed by John Landis and starring Dan Aykroyd, Chevy Chase, Vanessa Angel, Bruce Davison, Bernie Casey, Charles McKeown, Tom Hatten, Donna Dixon, Steve Forrest, Frank Oz, Terry Gilliam, James Daughton, Joel Coen, Sam Raimi, B.B. King, Costa-Gavras, Bob Hope, Michael Apted, Larry Cohen. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1985 adventure movies Category:1980s spy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American spy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by John Landis Category:Movies set in Afghanistan
title: Spies Like Us
